name: Pathetic Cube
description:
This is one of my firsts games. Released years ago on PSVita(PSMobile) and Android. I never finished it because I lost the project, but recently found it on an old hard drive and I thought about uploading it here. Here it is. Maybe I will finish it. 

The mechanic are simple. To complete the level you need to press the blue button, but on some levels you need to press the orange button before. Sometimes you need to use the environment to complete levels. Currently there are 9 levels and an infinite run mode.

All opinions are welcome.
